short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have a friend that is really passionate about the English language? Then don't install this extension on their machine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app makes sure that the web page always displays the wrong form of their, there, they're, you're, your, is, are, too, and to. This is version 0.1 too, it's only going to get better and more subtle in future versions.

Have fun! You jerk.
